title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: BONUS GTA$1,000,000
content:
Become a GTA+ Member and get a special GTA$1,000,000 bonus every month from April through August that'll be automatically deposited alongside the standard GTA$500,000.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
